item.title: The brief meeting between members of the House Freedom Caucus and Mike Johnson has disbanded. Johnson...
Live updates: Mike Johnson on track to fall short in first vote for House speaker
item.description: Congress returns Friday and is voting for a House speaker just days after President-elect Donald Trump endorsed Mike Johnson for reelection.
